ModMetaData.name: Market Value Filter
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a 'market value' filter to stockpile and ingredient selectors.
Inspired by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2178652457]Perishable Spoil Time Filter[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2912343138]it's 1.4 port[/url].
[url=https://ko-fi.com/K3K81Z3W5][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
